meanings.definition: A bar on a typewriter that carries a type or character.
meanings.sent1: The typebars on the old typewriter were dusty and worn.
meanings.sent2: When I press a key, the typebars swing up to print the letter on the paper.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat liked to play with the typebars, causing chaos on the typewriter.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like typebars, leaving a lasting impression wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The clacking sound of the typebars hitting the paper was oddly satisfying.

meanings.definition: A bar on a typewriter that strikes the paper to print a character.
meanings.sent1: The typebars moved swiftly, leaving behind a trail of printed words.
meanings.sent2: With each keystroke, the typebars imprinted the letters onto the page.
meanings.sent3: The typebars seemed to have a mind of their own, dancing across the paper.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts flowed like a river, each word striking the page like typebars.
meanings.sent5: The typebars worked tirelessly, bringing stories to life with each tap.
